title: anjEl enru
sahitya:
anjEl enru nI aruLuDan tanda vEl avaniyil enranai anudinam kAttiDum


anupallavi

  vanjikkoDi kura vaLLiyuDan nidam konji varum kumaraiyanE guhanE


caraNam    sattiya vazhi tannil shArndu nAn ninriDa shakti vElenakku shakti aLittiDum
 mukti aLikkum tiru mUlap-poruLinai bhaktiyuDan bhajikkap-parivuDan vazhi kATTum
